content:
Two men and a 17-year-old girl have been found guilty of murdering a doctor in a homophobic attack in a park in the centre of Cardiff.

BBC.COM
Three guilty of homophobic murder of doctor

comments_and_replies.comment: Let us hope that the sentence justifies their actions Unbelievable that a 16 year old girl was involved.
replies: Valerie Wheeler 17 year old girl .
Valerie Wheeler it's not unbelievable in this country the way things are going sadly
Not that unbelievable if you've ever encountered chavs
Valerie Wheeler don’t forget to half it for good behaviour!
Paul Evans Okay okay

Jonas Biwi Dionne Timms-Williams,
from Creigiau, was 16 at the time.

comments_and_replies.comment: Isn’t stamping on anyone’s head a hate crime? Sentence should be life no matter the victim, they should never be able to walk free again, the victim can’t. Just listen to what they said while beating someone to death 🤬🤬🤬
They should receive whole of life jail sentences. Anything less is a joke. We are far too soft in this country on serious crimes.
replies: Gill Robinson well said . Unless it’s whole life then the joke of a life sentence will be halved for good behaviour!

comments_and_replies.comment: Throw the bloody key away!!! So Gould never be released into the community again after what they did to this poor man.

One of them 17 ! Enjoy the rest of your youth and early middle years in prison. Bet you don't think it was a good idea now.
R.I.P
replies: Rob Wilson Not sure how it works in UK,if she can be convicted as an adult?
Jonas Kalén I think so Jonas, but i may be wrong there.
Jonas Kalén the judge did great in letting her be named,thought she was big enough to the crime then let her do the time..hope they kick the 💩 out of her.

Rob Wilson I read that they can, children as young as 10 can be tried as adults for the most serious crimes.
They can’t get life but many many years.
Rob Wilson they’ll be out in 6 months
Tim Hills I certainly hope its considerably longer than that.
Carolyn Bury Sadly in Sweden only from 18 years old you can get adult prison. So the gangs use the younger to shoot and kill rivals.They don’t mind to be in youth care for 2 years.
Jonas Kalén its a crazy horrible sad world we live in...

comments_and_replies.comment: Heartbreaking, such evil beings to get enjoyment out of killing a fellow human. Sentences need to be much much longer. Thoughts go out too the gentleman’s family and friends.
Ppl just can’t stay in their lane, they have to be consumed with others personal life, ideals & beliefs. The sentence better fit their gruesome act.

Life for life.

They knowingly inflicted terrible injuries on an innocent man, the proof is undeniable.

Death penalty is needed for cases like this where it is beyond all reasonable doubt.

Imagine what that poor man went through during this attack and then try and justify why any of them should still be alive after this verdict.
To call them animals is insulting to any member of the animal kingdom.

They have no place in our society and an example should be made of them, sadly it won't be a terminal example.

,The prosecution barrister (!!),rather than defence one,homophobica
lly and inexcusably shamed the innocent victim.
That barrister should be dropped by his chambers who themselves should step up and condemn his opening comments in court.The CPS should not engage him ever again.
replies: Hywel Ebsworth Not sure how it works over there but prosecutors should be fired for that opening statement. Horrible

comments_and_replies.comment: Doctors are saving lives and these are murderers killing, must get sevior punishment
Good, shocking what happened to that poor man 😢
replies: Kathleen Craig I think you meant to say God

comments_and_replies.comment: Absolutely awful that this is still happening in this day and age, and such a young person one of those responsible, as a society we need to do better, and you have people laughing at this 🤮
My thoughts are with his family and friends RIP

I’m guessing the writers of some of these comments have read other articles
As this one uses ‘homophobic’ in the heading but no other mention of anything g regarding that
In any case it doesn’t matter
Taking a life in any way is despicable and they need to be put away for the rest of their miserable Iives

What happened to the poor man😢
It's a pity the teenage girl will spend the rest of her life in jail
replies: Love & Relationship quotes, what?
Love & Relationship quotes not a pity at all!
Love & Relationship quotes what pity should she get? She helped end a life
Ges Gilbert
Love & Relationship quotes it's no pity at all. What is a pity is an innocent man's life being taken by these animals.
I can sense the IQ from here

Love & Relationship quotes
Why is it a pity? I don't believe in capital punishment, but in many countries that's exactly what she'd be looking at. In fact in some she would've already been executed, think on that with your pity.

comments_and_replies.comment: All that learning to become a doctor all what it cost and all that potential means nothing to these ignorant cretans xxx
replies: Maria Lee ...and all the lives that now WON'T be saved!

comments_and_replies.comment: Omg!! Just why??? Life should mean life, despicable individuals!
I have to wander how police etc came to the conclusion this man was cruising. Gay man in a park should Not equate to that conclusion
replies: It was in the wee hours

comments_and_replies.comment: Be a miracle if each of them get a sentence that actually fits the crime, bet they’re all back on the street in a few yrs 😡
A true life sentence, meaning every second of every day for te rest of their lives in prison .
how awful for him. poor man, what is this, Afghanistan!?
replies: Howard Andrew Digby wow comparing this to Afghan 🤦‍♂️
Howard Andrew Digby no, it's Cardiff, it says that in the post.
We’re they pa*is that did this? 😮

Shaz Romanov
Judging from your spelling I guess you don't have the mental capacity to read the first paragraph that contains the names!
Hocine Dridi the coward has a fake profile.
Shaz Romanov you should have been wiped on your mum's curtains.

comments_and_replies.comment: Not human , just rabid animals - should be locked in a cage for life, typically the one person laughing at this is a right wing trump supporter ! Says it all
I hope they all three get their due.
Hope they get there comeuppance in prison and more
RIP, Hope it was not also part of racism.
replies: T Boy T Boy racism?

comments_and_replies.comment: Danger to society, lock them away for good.
What a truly horrible country this is becoming 😢
replies: Ken Thursfield for real. Its sad that we must share this world with such cruel people
Ken Thursfield been like it for decades😞
Scott Taylor unfortunately I agree but it seems to be getting worse
Ken Thursfield it's already horrible 30 years ago, we cannot see it, blaming on foreigners, not anymore coz it's the British doings 😬 this is why I voted Tories and brexit to see all this 👍🏾
Ken Thursfield feeling the same way about Canada. You aren't alone. Humans are moving backwards in all ways it seems.
Mchull Teka nonsense. Much different society 30 years ago and no one said anything about "foreigners" except you.
JV Patterson society is the same as 30 years, the only difference was no mobiles and everything else is taboo and you probably likes it just move over to Australia/new Zealand 👍🏾
Scott Taylor everything getting worse 😪
Ken Thursfield everything getting worse
Social media showing us it’s worldwide, and making it worse in many cases. Lots of places in world horrible, always have been.

comments_and_replies.comment: Good lock them up for the rest of there lives
Hyenas. Hope they enjoy being part of the prison pack. Not.
If you bring back the rope then that chap could still be alive you know it make sense.
Just shows cruising in parks is still dangerous.
The world has gone crazy.
Hope they enjoy their next 30 yrs
Good they were found guilty. Now for a just sentence.
Why does the headline say ‘homophobic’?
Lock them up and throw the key away
replies: Andrew Smith agreed

comments_and_replies.comment: For God's sake 17 years old. 😒😔
Hope the sentences will be harsh. Life.
rope
Lock them up and throw away the key..should be life for a life,Rest in peace Gary..
Utterly heartbreaking.
Disgusting. Should be prevented from ever receiving medical attention again in the future.
The only problem caused by long prison sentences is the cost to the tax payer .
It's moment like these that make me question my stance on capital punishment. Please sentence them to the maximum for Dr. Jenkins.
Humanity at its worst.

A young girl my god disgusting human (not human if she thinks it's funny to Rob the Dr and kicking/
punching) shame on you and other men too..
Jail them for life till they die!!!
What the world coming to?
What up bringing do these murdering scumbags have
I just wish hanging was still used for cases were there is no doubt of guilt for such brutal and merciless crimes. 😠😠😠
replies: Liz Wainwright everyone will die at some point, it’s all our destiny on this earth, so death is hardly a punishment. Pain, guilt and remorse stops when you die. You’ve got to be alive to experience any form of punishment.

comments_and_replies.comment: Three half wits kill one person who’s given up years of his life to treat thousands of people (regardless of anything else in that title) We need a stronger punishment system
Simple solution to this - lock them up and give them no access to drs when they need one. Maybe then they’ll be remorseful of their actions 🤷🏼‍♀️
Wtf is this world coming too 😞
What do you expect from these low lives
Why will a 17 years old decide to waste her life that way ? Why do people care so much about someone's personal life that gat nothing to do with them ?
They should never spend a day as a free person, lock the door and throw away the keys.
So pathetic! RIP Dr😭😭💔💔

This is incredibly sad, how anyone could inflict such violence on such an innocent victim is beyond most peoples comprehension. These 'people's need to rot in jail until they die, which also should be where they will die

Lock up all three for minimum of 50 years each ,no messing around the fact the victims sexuality was the primary motive, means these three monsters should die in prison, essentially a whole life tariff.
Rachel Docherty
I hope they get the karmic justice they deserve when they meet the maker & rot in hell & die themselves a very cruel death. What pure evil humans these 3 are!
What is that? Can't you write an article that's more than four sentences long and provides sufficient information? It only says the trio tried to rob him and were egging each other on
What's wrong with humans these days?
replies: Mark Turnbull privileges - greed 🤷🏾‍♂️
Mark Turnbull nothing people have always been capable of brutality
Mark Turnbull they're not human. They're vile depraved beasts.
Mark Turnbull these days? Is gay bashing a new thing in your mind?
Mark Turnbull Better to have a dog. 😜

comments_and_replies.comment: Three idiots take a life because he won't fight back , so brave of them coward's.

How Horrific...
Those 3 need putting down!!!
Evil. How was this poor man affecting them in any way? What evil people.

'They think it's funny, it was just enjoyment for them'. Chilling, but those words sum it up in a nutshell. Whatever excuse you make for their behaviour, there really is no hope for some people. If you can do that because you feel you 'need it' at the age of sixteen, then I'm not sure there's any possibility of redemption for you. As for the two men - both old enough to know the difference between right and wrong. Give all three a sentence that means something for once.After all, the one they've just given to Dr Jenkins's family will run for life without parole.
Life should mean life, doubt the girl will get much but they should sterelise the little cnt anyway.
Lethal injections required for all three !
What a despicable act ! 😡
Omg 😳 what evil people 😡😢
Lock them away for good throwaway the Key
These people need putting down.

What vile monsters, they're definately not human! I really hope their sentences are long. They all deserve 30yrs at least. Little miss 17yr old doesn't need any mercy either because of her age, she enjoyed every minute taking that man's life from him!!
The eye-witness account is kind of weird. He just watched?
replies: Camilla Johansson he tried to create a barrier but they turned on him
Ah!
Camilla Johansson no, it said he attempted to protect the man until they turned on him too. Right in the article.
Camilla Johansson did you actually read the article? Have another look 🤦‍♂️
Camilla Johansson No! Read the article.
Steve Cole Ok, I missed the last sentence. I'm not going to apologise for asking though. It's always better to ask one question too many than one too few.
Anne Gallagher How about you read the dialogue in response to my question.
How about you delete your comment?
Camilla Johansson would you of saved this man from 3 attackers?
Hughie Roberts Probably not, but I like to think that I wouldn't just have watched, which I know now that the witness didn't. Read the comments.
Anne Gallagher How about "No"?
Camilla Johansson How about you not looking for argument and being a bully? Where you are bully in school? I bet 10 to 1 that you were!!! Now go away like a good little girl.
Camilla Johansson how about you read the article. Oh you didn't, you skipped through and missed the important points about the eye witness.
Camilla Johansson they have also been charged with assault on the eye witness

Cruel

Absolutely disgusting.
